verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Where is the <S%H5612>bill<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H3748>divorce,<s%> with which I have put her <S%H7971>away?<s%> or which of my <S%H5383>creditors<s%> is it to whom I have <S%H4376>sold<s%> <S%H5771>you?<s%> Behold, for your iniquities were you <S%H4376>sold,<s%> and for your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> was your <S%H517>mother<s%> put <S%H7971>away.<s%>

<S%H935>Why,<s%> when I came, was there no <S%H376>man?<s%> when I <S%H7121>called,<s%> was there none to <S%H6030>answer?<s%> Is my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7114>shortened<s%> at <S%H7114>all,<s%> that it <S%H6304>can't<s%> redeem? or have I no <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver?<s%> <S%H1606>Behold,<s%> at my rebuke I dry <S%H2717>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> I <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> a <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> their <S%H1710>fish<s%> <S%H887>stink,<s%> because there is no <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H4191>die<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>
I <S%H3847>clothe<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H6940>blackness,<s%> and I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> their <S%H3682>covering.<s%>"

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of those who are <S%H3928>taught,<s%> that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> how to <S%H5790>sustain<s%> with <S%H1697>words<s%> him who is <S%H3287>weary:<s%> he <S%H5782>wakens<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> he <S%H5782>wakens<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> as those who are <S%H3928>taught.<s%>
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H241>ear,<s%> and I was not <S%H4784>rebellious,<s%> neither turned <S%H5472>away<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>

I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H1460>back<s%> to the <S%H5221>strikers,<s%> and my <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> to those who plucked <S%H4803>off<s%> the <S%H5641>hair;<s%> I didn't hide my <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H3639>shame<s%> and <S%H7536>spitting.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H3637>me;<s%> therefore I have not been confounded: therefore have I <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> like a <S%H2496>flint,<s%> and I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall not be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%>

He is <S%H7138>near<s%> who <S%H6663>justifies<s%> <S%H7378>me;<s%> who will bring charges against <S%H5975>me?<s%> Let us stand up <S%H3162>together:<s%> who is my <S%H1167>adversary?<s%> Let him come near to <S%H5066>me.<s%>

<S%H136>Behold,<s%> the Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H7561>me;<s%> who is he who shall condemn <S%H1086>me?<s%> Behold, all they shall wax old as a <S%H899>garment,<s%> the <S%H6211>moth<s%> shall eat them <S%H398>up.<s%>

Who is among you who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H8085>obeys<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant?<s%> He who <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H2825>darkness,<s%> and has no <S%H5051>light,<s%> let him <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H8172>rely<s%> on his <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H6919>Behold,<s%> all you who kindle a <S%H784>fire,<s%> who adorn yourselves with <S%H2131>torches<s%> <S%H247>around<s%> <S%H3212>yourselves;<s%> walk in the <S%H217>flame<s%> of your <S%H784>fire,<s%> and among the <S%H2131>brands<s%> that you have <S%H1197>kindled.<s%> You shall have this of my <S%H3027>hand;<s%> you shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H4620>sorrow.<s%>
